Text:
I purchased the Branston Original Pickle for my mother as she does not eat dill pickles and being from England she remembers the great taste. This is the first itme I have ordered Branston but will use this seller again when my mother runs low.
This Jar was well wrapped in bubble wrap before being shipped to me in a strong box that arrived without any damage. I received my box well before the expected date. This shipper is excellent.
